title: Ladies Day
description:
_At the building_

_Light Breakfast: 8:00 - 8:45 AM_

_Program: 9 AM - 2 PM_

_Theme: Color Me Beautiful Through Faith, Hope, and Love_

Eagle Valley Church of Christ would like to invite ladies of all ages to a day of fellowship and the study of God's Word.

Please let us know by Sept 23, 2018 how many from your congregation will be attending by contacting us at 317-397-9923.

Lunch will be provided.
